alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 3:57AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG WILL CONTINUE TO AFFECT SHERIDAN COUNTY... Patchy dense fog continues over portions of Sheridan county, especially along I-90 south of Sheridan. The fog is expected to last through mid morning. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Ranchester, Dayton, Big Horn, Clearmont, Leiter, Arvada, Parkman, Banner and Story. Visibilities are below one quarter of a mile in the fog in a few locations, mainly in the higher hills. Icy roads are possible as the fog deposits moisture on road surfaces which quickly freeze. Bridges and Overpasses will be most susceptible to icing up. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations. Also, be prepared for icy spots and allow extra time when traveling this morning.
